Summary: Bright circle appeared out of no where in night sky then jetted off in the blink of an eye
divs: sighting detailsfirst let me say i am very sane, own a business and very much a realist, but know strange things happen and i am more than intelligent to differentiate lights, planes, flares, jets, helicopters, comets etc.. in manhattan, it is very infrequent we have clear skies and i have 20\20 vision so i can see much better than my counterparts at night.. in this case, you did not need 20\20 vision. i was living in a 3000sf loft in soho (downtown manhattan) having a when i had this feeling to go look out the window ( which are 10 foot high windows). i started looking up at the night sky and saw stars were visible and said wow ..i stead-fastly glanced around to see how many i could see, eventually i saw two faint stars that looked too close together, so i focused my view towards them...(i admit i am curious about our skies) it seemed odd two stars could be that close..after a minute of concentrating my attention to them.. unbelievably... this bright light appeared out of nowhere!! it looked as if it was a few hundred feet above the building and soho has 6-8 story low buildings. it appeared instantaneously out of the dark, very bright, motionless, shape and size was like the circles you fill in on an sat exam, no more than 5 seconds after it had become visible and i could finally finish utterring "what the ...." it darted off so tremendously fast that i screamed so loud to my girlfriend to come. my heart was beating so fast and i cursed myself for not having a camcorder handy. no noise, no smoke, nothing. we jumped out onto the fire escape to see if it would return...nothing, i would have stayed looking but clouds just moved in very quickly and covered the skies completely...strange? the reason this night was odd; i very rarely looked out those windows before and it was 2ish in the morning on a sunday and we were just relaxing. i had the urge to go look out into the sky and why did i focus in that direction and exactly where i was looking, this occurred as if i was supposed to see it. i have not been the same since - i have always believed we are not alone, but never seen anything remotely close to that night and that was no ordinary, explainable occurrence. (i'm not religious) so unless god was doing a magic trick for me, that was the number one unexplainable thing i have ever witnessed. i called everyone that same night\morning that's quite a few people; they all believed me, a few even mentioned they have seen plenty of things in the sky similar in their countries as their nights are much clearer than ours, one even laughed and told me, come to my country and you will see something is happening in the skies that we are not being told. my friends are from all over - israel, peru, ecquador, brazil, england etc.. next day and after that, i was researching everything, every website, current stories, ufo sites, recent news etc... to see if anyone saw or reported the same or similar. nothing, however, strange things started happening after that - i won't mention so people start thinking i'm nutty - one thing i will mention is 3 nights after, a helicopter was flying continuously directly over my building\area for approx. 30 minutes between 3-4am in the morning. that was extremely unusual in this very quiet neighborhood..in manhattan period! especially at that time of morning. i figured it had to be military in type due to the very loud sound of the roters. i looked out and up and i could see only the shape, but also three bright large square lights under it. i didn't know helicopters had huge lights like that underneath them, they were not search lights, more like the bottom of the helicopter. i have since gone and bought a serious camcorder with night vision and infrared with extended magnification. i am now fully equipped ..sorry for the long story, but i have not been the same and i don't like not knowing, especially after what i saw.
